snippet.title: Apotheon Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Released Feb 3rd for Steam and Playstation 4

Apotheon is a heroic action game set within the vibrant world of Ancient Greek Mythology. Ascend Mount Olympus, wrestle the divine powers from the Pantheon of Gods, and save mankind..

https://www.facebook.com/Alientrap
https://twitter.com/Alientrap

Music by Marios Aristopoulos for the Apotheon soundtrack
